stories.text:
I'm losing my hair and it is bringing me down. I know "just shave it". Ok, easy if you have a body like Bruce Willis or Jason Statham. Not so easy if you are pale and pudgy. I get envious when I see men in their 60's or 70's that have full hair that is not even thinning. I catch myself comparing my hair with other balding men. To see who is "furthest" or who has lost the most. Sometimes I wish I had lost it in my early 20's like my brothers cause then it wouldn't have become part of my identity. I liked having hair.

Prescriptions or miracle cures that actually work? Affordable hair transplants? Maybe I can't except much as I'm over 40...
stories.title: Ask HN: Coping with Hair Loss

stories.text:
I cannot sign in into amazon.com because they try to "send message" to my phone number, and it never arrives. Maybe sending messages to Russian phone numbers in 2022 is considered a bad move and they don't really send it -- only say that they did.

And there's no way to reach customer support via email, you have to call some US number.

First they lure you by "send the sample of this book to your Kindle" button, and then such a dead end.
stories.title: Generic Amazon Rant
